channel.title: Difficult topic
channel.description:
Hey guys,
I think it's rather difficult to do this in a 508 client, thus I came here for help!
What does one search for in client.java to change the IP address of the remote computer (dedicated server)?
I've tried the 127.0.0.1, no-ip, localhost..... anyone have any other suggestions?
Thanks

item.title: Difficult topic
item.dc:creator: @bode bode
